content.title: Uses
content.description: Fruits are used as condiment and has medicinal value. Traditionally used for relief in a cough, asthma, indigestion, dental problems, sore throat and wounds. It has glucoside, tannins, gallic acid, ellagic acid, ethyl galate, gallyl glucose, chebulanic acid. Medicinal activities include: antisecretory, analgesic, antihypertensive, antidiarrhoeal activity, antimicrobial activity antidiabetic, antioxidant, antiulcer, antipyretic, hepatoprotective, anticancer, angiogenesis, antidepressant-like and anti-urolithiaticactivity.
